column5: welcome to the site.  I'm sure you both will enjoy your time here.

Hello OFC members, my name is Ryan Smith and I would just like to introduce myself and my wonderful partner to this awesome community I have stumbled upon. I can't thank you all enough for all the posts in this forum from the techniques to the trip reports (my favorite), I enjoy them all.SO much so that while I was waiting for validation I read almost every post back to May, lol (it took a few weeks to be validated).  My aim is to be a contributing member of this forum, learn a tonne from the wealth of knowledge here, as well as hopefully meet some good outdoor/fishing buddies or couples. I am 29 years old living with my g/f (Ashley) who is 28 in the busy city of Toronto.... we love sports and the outdoors and have recently been bitten by the fishing and outdoors/camping/hunting bug.  As far as fishing is concerned because we are new to Toronto we don't get out enough (no boat, not sure where to go from shore) except for near the mouth of the humber river but have been skunked twice during the summer. We have been on one fly in trip (i have been on 2), and sturgeon fishing in b.c. (trip reports will come in the next couple of weeks).  However I grew up near the wonderful Lake St. Clair and return to visit my family there a few times a year and make sure I get out for some fishing on my fathers boat at least a couple times a trip. Love LSC.  Before I ramble on to much farther, thanks again for all your posts and the people that run this site I really an truly appreciate you all!!  Best, Ryan and Ashley (pairofgreenhorns)
I'm sure everyone would love to see pics of that sturgeon trip!   Welcome
Welcome to the site…great intro btw!

Welcome to the board ! I love fishing with my GF too. Recently on her first fishing trip ever, she got a 53 inch Musky as her first fish. Now she is hooked LOL !!! Enjoy the group and all it has to offer.
Great intro  Welcome aboard
Welcome aboard Ryan and Ashley. Looking forward to reading of your adventures.
Welcome aboard. You will love it here.
Welcome aboard Ryan and Ashley
Welcome to OFC Ryan and Ashley.  There are a few to watch out for around here, apparently, I am one of them!  Cheers, Ron...
Wolcome friends.   Looking forward to seeing some pics from your BC trip - bet that was awesome.
Welcome aboard...
Welcome aboard
Welcome to you both!!!Saying we have fun is a understatement.Can't wait as well for the BC trip!
Welcome aboard there are a bunch of us in the LSC area shoot me a message when your home if I'm free maybe we can get out on LSC. Cheers
Thank  you all for the very warm welcome! Just getting the B.C. and fly-in pics together for some trip reports... I will keep that in mind Mike P it sounds like a good idea.
Pairofgreenhorns - I like that handle!  You'll get along well with most of us.  Welcome to the board.
Welcome
Welcome aboard !!!!!! And yes we love fish porn!!! Tight-lines.    Shawn
Welcome to the board and you cant go wrong with a trip out with MikeP.   Art
Welcome aboard!  Everything you need to know can be found in the following Aaron Wiebe video:    You're welcome.
LOL
Welcome and I bet the B.C trip was amazing can't wait to read the report

Great intro x 3. There are some very unexpected hot spots to fish in TO one would never expect to find.  Google Bob Izumi with Taro fishing the harbor front for pike, big pike in winter under the shadows of the glass towers, it's cool. Also carp from Toronto Island, lots of big carp, and of course the tributaries for the salmon and Trout.  Welcome aboard, enjoy your time here, you will get hooked for sure, and hook a few as well with all the great advice.  Johnny D
Being new is cool!   Welcome!¡!¡
Welcome aboard to you both...  Great group here...  Never met a member I didn't like...mind you...There are some I'm not in a hurry to meet...
